info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 3:56PM MST until November 24 at 6:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO 6 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations mostly 2 to 5 inches, but up to 8 inches possible in the Ruby and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph, mainly Thursday afternoon and evening. * WHERE...Northwest Beaverhead County and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...From midnight Wednesday Night to 6 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, mainly Thursday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
